pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Exploration of Contour Data // An interactive tool to explore topographic-like data sets. Such data sets take the form of a matrix in which the rows and columns provide location/frequency information, and the matrix elements contain altitude/response information. Such data is found in cartography, 2D spectroscopy and chemometrics. exCon creates an interactive web page showing the contoured data set along with slices from the original matrix parallel to each dimension. The page is written in d3/javascript.
